reviewText: Same outstanding quality as the original airing.  My kids and now grandkids have profited much from watching Mr. Rogers Neighborhood Episodes with his kind and gentle ways.  So glad I found this DAD.
I love Mr Rogers, but I found this episode to be kind of boring.
My son loves Mister Rogers neighborhood. A timeless classic. Children these days could benefit from his teaching. We will be purchasing more.
All children should know Mr. Rogers.  He teaches good behavior and shows kids how things work.  Wonderful show for children
